name: Hailing Plague
description:
Plagues are hailing from above! Avoid them and collect as much coins as possible before you perish!

This game was made from one of Blackthornprod's Udemy course and served as a foundation to this game. After completion of the course, I added more features and my own touches to it. 

May encounter some bugs due to my inexperience with Unity and coding. 

Critiques/advice on what can be improved are welcome and appreciated. 

Best experience in full screen. Enjoy!
